trans-unit.source: Equivalent to get_byte. This method is obsolete; use get_byte instead.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 get_byte 。这种方法已经过时了。使用 get_byte 代替。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to peek. This method is obsolete; use peek instead.
trans-unit.target: 相当于 peek 。这种方法已经过时了。改用 peek 。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to terminate. This method is obsolete; use terminate instead.
trans-unit.target: 相当于 terminate 。这种方法已经过时了。使用 terminate 代替。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to $_ = $_.chomp(string). See String#chomp. Available only when -p/-n command line option specified.
Equivalent to $_ = $_.chomp(string). See String#chomp. Available only when -p/-n command line option specified.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 $_ = $_.chomp(string) 。参见 String#chomp 。仅在指定-p / -n命令行选项时可用。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to $_.gsub..., except that $_ will be updated if substitution occurs. Available only when -p/-n command line option specified.
trans-unit.target: 与 $_.gsub... 等效，除了 $_ 如果发生替换将更新。仅在指定-p / -n命令行选项时可用。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to $_.sub(args), except that $_ will be updated if substitution occurs. Available only when -p/-n command line option specified.
trans-unit.target: 与 $_.sub(args) 等效，除了 $_ 如果发生替换将更新。仅在指定-p / -n命令行选项时可用。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to ($_.dup).chop!, except nil is never returned. See String#chop!. Available only when -p/-n command line option specified.
Equivalent to ($_.dup).chop!, except nil is never returned. See String#chop!. Available only when -p/-n command line option specified.
trans-unit.target: 相当于 ($_.dup).chop! ，但永远不会返回 nil 。看到 String#chop! 。仅在指定-p / -n命令行选项时可用。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to File::chmod, but does not follow symbolic links (so it will change the permissions associated with the link, not the file referenced by the link). Often not available.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 File::chmod ，但不跟随符号链接（因此它将更改与链接关联的权限，而不是由链接引用的文件）。通常不可用。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to File::chown, but does not follow symbolic links (so it will change the owner associated with the link, not the file referenced by the link). Often not available. Returns number of files in the argument list.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 File::chown ，但是不跟随符号链接（因此它将更改与链接关联的所有者，而不是链接所引用的文件）。通常不可用。返回参数列表中的文件数。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to Hash#delete_if, but returns nil if no changes were made.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 Hash#delete_if ，但如果未进行任何更改，则返回 nil 。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to Kernel::gets, except readline raises EOFError at end of file.
trans-unit.target: 与 Kernel::gets 等效，除了 readline 在文件末尾引发 EOFError 。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to Math.sqrt(n).floor, except that the result of the latter code may differ from the true value due to the limited precision of floating point arithmetic.
trans-unit.target: 与 Math.sqrt(n).floor 等效，不同之处在于，由于浮点运算的精度有限，后一个代码的结果可能与真实值有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to Proc.new, except the resulting Proc objects check the number of parameters passed when called.
trans-unit.target: 与 Proc.new 等效，除了生成的 Proc 对象检查调用时传递的参数数。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to String#succ, but modifies the receiver in place.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 String#succ ，但在适当位置修改接收器。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to String#swapcase, but modifies the receiver in place, returning str, or nil if no changes were made.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 String#swapcase ，但是就地修改接收方，返回str，如果未进行任何更改，则返回 nil 。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to setpgid(0,0). Not available on all platforms.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 setpgid(0,0) 。并非在所有平台上都可用。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to Kernel::gets, except readline raises EOFError at end of file.
Errno::EACCES - search permission is denied for a component of the prefix path or write access to the socket is denied
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EACCES-前缀路径的某个组件的搜索权限被拒绝，或者对 socket 写访问被拒绝

trans-unit.source: Errno::EACCES - the attempt to connect the datagram socket to the broadcast address failed
trans-unit.target: Errno::EACCES-连接数据报套接字到广播地址的尝试失败。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EACCES - the calling process does not have appropriate privileges
trans-unit.target: Errno::EACCES-调用进程没有适当的权限。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EACCES - the specified sockaddr is protected and the current user does not have permission to bind to it
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EACCES-指定的sockaddr受保护，当前用户无权绑定到它

trans-unit.source: Errno::EADDRINUSE - the sockaddr is already in use
Errno::EADDRINUSE - the socket's local address is already in use
trans-unit.target: Errno::EADDRINUSE-套接字的本地地址已经在使用中。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EADDRINUSE - the socket's local address is already in use. This usually occurs during the execution of bind but could be delayed if the call to bind was to a partially wildcard address (involving ADDR_ANY) and if a specific address needs to be committed at the time of the call to listen
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EADDRINUSE-套接字的本地地址已在使用中。这通常在执行绑定期间发生，但是如果绑定的调用是部分通配符地址（涉及ADDR_ANY）并且在调用侦听时需要提交特定地址，则可能会延迟

trans-unit.source: Errno::EADDRINUSE - the specified sockaddr is already in use
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EADDRINUSE-指定的sockaddr已在使用中

trans-unit.source: Errno::EADDRNOTAVAIL - the remote address is not a valid address, such as ADDR_ANY TODO check ADDRANY TO INADDR_ANY
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EADDRNOTAVAIL-远程地址不是有效地址，例如ADDR_ANY TODO检查ADDRANY到 INADDR_ANY

trans-unit.source: Errno::EADDRNOTAVAIL - the specified sockaddr is not available from the local machine
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EADDRNOTAVAIL-指定的sockaddr在本地计算机上不可用

trans-unit.source: Errno::EADDRNOTAVAIL - the specified address is not a valid address for this computer
trans-unit.target: Errno::EADDRNOTAVAIL-指定的地址不是此计算机的有效地址。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EAFNOSUPPORT - addresses in the specified family cannot be used with with this socket
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EAFNOSUPPORT-指定系列中的地址不能与此 socket 一起使用

trans-unit.source: Errno::EAFNOSUPPORT - the specified sockaddr is not a valid address for the address family of the specified socket
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EAFNOSUPPORT-指定的sockaddr对于指定 socket 的地址族不是有效地址

trans-unit.source: Errno::EAFNOSUPPORT - the specified sockaddr is not a valid address for the family of the calling socket
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EAFNOSUPPORT-指定的sockaddr对于调用 socket 的系列不是有效地址

trans-unit.source: Errno::EAGAIN - the socket file descriptor is marked as O_NONBLOCK and no data is waiting to be received; or MSG_OOB is set and no out-of-band data is available and either the socket file descriptor is marked as O_NONBLOCK or the socket does not support blocking to wait for out-of-band-data
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EAGAIN- socket 文件描述符标记为O_NONBLOCK，并且没有数据等待接收；或设置了 MSG_OOB 且没有带外数据可用，并且 socket 文件描述符标记为O_NONBLOCK或 socket 不支持阻塞以等待带外数据

trans-unit.source: Errno::EALREADY - a connection is already in progress for the specified socket
trans-unit.target: Errno::EALREADY-对于指定的套接字,连接已经在进行中。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EBADF - the socket is not a valid file descriptor
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EBADF- socket 不是有效的文件描述符

trans-unit.source: Errno::EBADF - the sockaddr specified is not a valid file descriptor
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EBADF- 指定的sockaddr不是有效的文件描述符

trans-unit.source: Errno::EBADF - the socket argument is not a valid file descriptor
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EBADF- 套接字参数不是有效的文件描述符

trans-unit.source: Errno::ECONNREFUSED - the target sockaddr was not listening for connections refused the connection request
trans-unit.target: Errno :: ECONNREFUSED-目标sockaddr没有侦听连接被拒绝的连接请求

trans-unit.source: Errno::EDESTADDRREQ - the sockaddr argument is a null pointer
Errno::EDESTADDRREQ - the socket is not bound to a local address, and the protocol does not support listening on an unbound socket
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EDESTADDRREQ- 套接字未绑定到本地地址，并且该协议不支持在未绑定的套接字上侦听

trans-unit.source: Errno::EFAULT - the sockaddr argument cannot be accessed
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EFAULT- 无法访问sockaddr参数

trans-unit.source: Errno::EFAULT - the internal buffer and from parameters on socket are not part of the user address space, or the internal fromlen parameter is too small to accommodate the peer address
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EFAULT-内部缓冲区和 socket 上的from参数不属于用户地址空间，或者内部fromlen参数太小而无法容纳对等地址

trans-unit.source: Errno::EFAULT - the socket's internal address or address length parameter is too small or is not a valid part of the user space address
trans-unit.target: Errno::EFAULT-套接字的内部地址或地址长度参数太小,或者不是用户空间地址的有效部分。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EFAULT - the socket's internal address or address length parameter is too small or is not a valid part of the user space addressed
trans-unit.target: Errno::EFAULT-套接字的内部地址或地址长度参数太小,或者不是用户空间的有效部分。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EFAULT - the socket's internal buffer, address or address length cannot be accessed or written
trans-unit.target: Errno::EFAULT-不能访问或写入套接字的内部缓冲区、地址或地址长度。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EHOSTUNREACH - no route to the network is present
trans-unit.target: Errno::EHOSTUNREACH-不存在通往网络的路由。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EHOSTUNREACH - the destination host cannot be reached (probably because the host is down or a remote router cannot reach it)
trans-unit.target: Errno::EHOSTUNREACH-目标主机无法到达(可能是因为主机宕机或远程路由器无法到达)。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EINPROGRESS - a Windows Sockets 1.1 call is in progress or the service provider is still processing a callback function
trans-unit.target: Errno::EINPROGRESS-一个Windows Sockets 1.1调用正在进行中,或者服务提供者仍在处理一个回调函数。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EINPROGRESS - a blocking Windows Sockets 1.1 call is in progress or the service provider is still processing a callback function
trans-unit.target: Errno::EINPROGRESS-一个阻塞的Windows Sockets 1.1调用正在进行中,或者服务提供者仍在处理一个回调函数。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EINPROGRESS - a blocking socket is in progress or the service provider is still processing a callback function. Or a nonblocking connect call is in progress on the socket.
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EINPROGRESS-正在阻止套接字，或者服务提供者仍在处理回调函数。或者 socket 上正在进行无阻塞的connect调用。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EINPROGRESS - the O_NONBLOCK is set for the socket and the connection cannot be immediately established; the connection will be established asynchronously
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EINPROGRESS-为 socket 设置了O_NONBLOCK，并且无法立即建立连接；连接将异步建立

trans-unit.source: Errno::EINTR - a signal interrupted recvfrom before any data was available
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EINTR-信号在任何数据可用之前中断recvfrom

trans-unit.source: Errno::EINTR - the (blocking) call was cancelled by an internal call to the WinSock function WSACancelBlockingCall
trans-unit.target: Errno::EINTR-该(阻塞)调用被WinSock函数WSACancelBlockingCall的内部调用所取消。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EINTR - the attempt to establish the connection was interrupted by delivery of a signal that was caught; the connection will be established asynchronously
trans-unit.target: Errno::EINTR-建立连接的尝试因传递一个被捕获的信号而中断;连接将被异步建立。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EINVAL - socket has not been bound with a call to bind, or an unknown flag was specified, or MSG_OOB was specified for a socket with SO_OOBINLINE enabled, or (for byte stream-style sockets only) the internal len parameter on socket was zero or negative
trans-unit.target: 错误号:: EINVAL - socket 没有被绑定到一个电话绑定，或指定一个未知的标志，或者 MSG_OOB 是一个套接字指定与 SO_OOBINLINE 启用，或（对于字节流式套接字只）内部LEN参数上的 socket 为零或负

trans-unit.source: Errno::EINVAL - the MSG_OOB flag is set and no out-of-band data is available
trans-unit.target: Errno :: MSG_OOB 设置了MSG_OOB标志，并且没有可用的带外数据

trans-unit.source: Errno::EINVAL - the socket has not been bound with a call to bind.
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EINVAL- socket 尚未绑定到bind调用。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EINVAL - the socket is a listening socket
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EINVAL-该 socket 是一个监听套接字

trans-unit.source: Errno::EINVAL - the socket is already bound to an address
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EINVAL- socket 已经绑定到一个地址

trans-unit.source: Errno::EINVAL - the socket is already bound to an address, and the protocol does not support binding to the new sockaddr or the socket has been shut down.
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EINVAL- socket 已经绑定到地址，并且协议不支持绑定到新的sockaddr或 socket 已关闭。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EINVAL - the socket has been shut down
Errno::EINVAL - the address length is not a valid length for the address family
trans-unit.target: Errno::EINVAL-地址长度不是地址族的有效长度。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EINVAL - the address length used for the sockaddr is not a valid length for the address family or there is an invalid family in sockaddr
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EINVAL-用于sockaddr的地址长度对于该地址族来说不是有效的长度，或者在sockaddr中有一个无效的族

trans-unit.source: Errno::EIO - an i/o error occurred while reading from or writing to the file system
trans-unit.target: Errno::EIO-在读取或写入文件系统时发生了一个i/o错误。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EIO - an i/o error occurred while reading from or writing to the filesystem
trans-unit.target: Errno::EIO-在读取或写入文件系统时发生了一个i/o错误。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EISCONN - socket is already connected. The call to recvfrom is not permitted with a connected socket on a socket that is connection oriented or connectionless.
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EISCONN- socket 已连接。面向连接或无连接的套接字上的连接套接字不允许调用recvfrom。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EISCONN - the specified socket is already connected
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EISCONN-指定的 socket 已连接

trans-unit.source: Errno::ELOOP - too many symbolic links were encountered in translating the pathname in sockaddr
trans-unit.target: Errno :: ELOOP-在翻译sockaddr中的路径名时遇到太多符号链接

trans-unit.source: Errno::EMFILE - no more socket descriptors are available
trans-unit.target: Errno::EMFILE-没有更多的套接字描述符可用。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EMSGSIZE - the message was too large to fit into the specified buffer and was truncated.
trans-unit.target: Errno::EMSGSIZE-消息太大,无法放入指定的缓冲区而被截断。

trans-unit.source: Errno::ENAMETOOLLONG - a component of a pathname exceeded NAME_MAX characters, or an entire pathname exceeded PATH_MAX characters
trans-unit.target: Errno::ENAMETOOLLONG-路径名的一个组成部分超过了NAME_MAX字符,或者整个路径名超过了PATH_MAX字符。

trans-unit.source: Errno::ENAMETOOLONG - the pathname resolved had a length which exceeded PATH_MAX
trans-unit.target: Errno::ENAMETOOLONG-解决的路径名长度超过了PATH_MAX。

trans-unit.source: Errno::ENETDOWN - the local interface used to reach the destination is down
trans-unit.target: Errno::ENETDOWN-用于到达目的地的本地接口已关闭。

trans-unit.source: Errno::ENETRESET - the connection has been broken due to the keep-alive activity detecting a failure while the operation was in progress.
trans-unit.target: Errno::ENETRESET-由于在操作过程中,keep-alive活动检测到失败,连接已经中断。

trans-unit.source: Errno::ENETUNREACH - no route to the network is present
trans-unit.target: Errno::ENETUNREACH-不存在通往网络的路由。

trans-unit.source: Errno::ENETUNREACH - the network cannot be reached from this host at this time
trans-unit.target: Errno::ENETUNREACH-此时此刻无法从该主机到达网络。

trans-unit.source: Errno::ENOBUFS - insufficient resources are available in the system to complete the call
trans-unit.target: Errno::ENOBUFS-系统中没有足够的资源来完成调用。

trans-unit.source: Errno::ENOBUFS - insufficient resources were available in the system to perform the operation
trans-unit.target: Errno::ENOBUFS-系统中没有足够的资源来执行该操作。

trans-unit.source: Errno::ENOBUFS - no buffer space is available
Errno::ENOENT - a component of the pathname does not name an existing file or the pathname is an empty string
trans-unit.target: Errno::ENOENT-路径名中的一个组件没有命名一个现有的文件,或者路径名是一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Errno::ENOMEM - insufficient memory was available to fulfill the request
trans-unit.target: Errno::ENOMEM-没有足够的内存来满足请求。

trans-unit.source: Errno::ENOSR - there were insufficient STREAMS resources available to complete the operation
trans-unit.target: Errno::ENOSR ----没有足够的STREAMS资源来完成操作。

trans-unit.source: Errno::ENOTCONN - a receive is attempted on a connection-mode socket that is not connected
trans-unit.target: Errno::ENOTCONN-在没有连接的连接模式套接字上尝试接收。

trans-unit.source: Errno::ENOTDIR - a component of the path prefix of the pathname in sockaddr is not a directory
trans-unit.target: Errno :: ENOTDIR- sockaddr中路径名的路径前缀的路径不是目录

trans-unit.source: Errno::ENOTSOCK - the socket argument does not refer to a socket
trans-unit.target: Errno :: ENOTSOCK- socket 参数未引用套接字

trans-unit.source: Errno::ENOTSOCK - the socket does not refer to a socket
trans-unit.target: Errno :: ENOTSOCK- socket 不引用套接字

trans-unit.source: Errno::ENOTSOCK - the socket argument does not refer to a socket
trans-unit.target: Errno :: ENOTSOCK- 套接字参数未引用套接字

trans-unit.source: Errno::EOPNOTSUPP - MSG_OOB was specified, but socket is not stream-style such as type SOCK_STREAM. OOB data is not supported in the communication domain associated with socket, or socket is unidirectional and supports only send operations
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EOPNOTSUPP- 指定了 MSG_OOB ，但是 socket 不是流式的，例如 SOCK_STREAM 类型。与 socket 关联的通信域中不支持OOB数据，或者 socket 是单向的，并且仅支持发送操作

trans-unit.source: Errno::EOPNOTSUPP - the socket protocol does not support listen
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EOPNOTSUPP- 套接字协议不支持监听

trans-unit.source: Errno::EOPNOTSUPP - the calling socket is listening and cannot be connected
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EOPNOTSUPP-调用 socket 正在侦听，无法连接

trans-unit.source: Errno::EOPNOTSUPP - the referenced socket is not a type that supports the listen method
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EOPNOTSUPP-引用的 socket 不是支持侦听方法的类型

trans-unit.source: Errno::EOPNOTSUPP - the socket type of the socket does not support binding to an address
trans-unit.target: 错误号:: EOPNOTSUPP -套接字类型的 socket ，不支持绑定到一个地址

trans-unit.source: Errno::EOPNOTSUPP - the specified flags are not supported for this socket type
trans-unit.target: Errno::EOPNOTSUPP-该套接字类型不支持指定的标志。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EPROTOTYPE - the sockaddr has a different type than the socket bound to the specified peer address
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EPROTOTYPE- sockaddr的类型不同于绑定到指定对等地址的套接字的类型

trans-unit.source: Errno::EROFS - the name would reside on a read only filesystem
trans-unit.target: Errno::EROFS-该名称将驻留在一个只读的文件系统中。

trans-unit.source: Errno::ESHUTDOWN - socket has been shutdown. It is not possible to call recvfrom on a socket after shutdown has been invoked.
trans-unit.target: Errno :: ESHUTDOWN- socket 已关闭。调用关机后，无法在套接字上调用recvfrom。

trans-unit.source: Errno::ETIMEDOUT - the attempt to connect time out before a connection was made.
trans-unit.target: Errno::ETIMEDOUT--在连接前尝试连接超时。

trans-unit.source: Errno::ETIMEDOUT - the connection has been dropped, because of a network failure or because the system on the other end went down without notice
trans-unit.target: Errno::ETIMEDOUT-由于网络故障或另一端的系统在没有通知的情况下中断了连接。

trans-unit.source: Errno::ETIMEDOUT - the connection timed out during connection establishment or due to a transmission timeout on an active connection
trans-unit.target: Errno::ETIMEDOUT-连接建立过程中或活动连接上的传输超时导致的连接超时。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EWOULDBLOCK - socket is marked as nonblocking and a call to recvfrom would block.
trans-unit.target: Errno :: EWOULDBLOCK- socket 被标记为非阻塞，并且对recvfrom的调用将阻塞。

trans-unit.source: Errno::EWOULDBLOCK - the socket is marked as nonblocking and the connection cannot be completed immediately
trans-unit.target: Errno::EWOULDBLOCK-该套接字被标记为非阻塞,连接不能立即完成。

trans-unit.source: Error raised by a dRuby protocol when it doesn't support the scheme specified in a URI. See DRb::DRbProtocol.
trans-unit.target: dRuby协议不支持 URI 中指定的方案时引发的错误。参见 DRb::DRbProtocol 。

trans-unit.source: Error raised by the DRb module when an attempt is made to refer to the context's current drb server but the context does not have one. See current_server.
trans-unit.target: 尝试引用上下文的当前drb服务器但上下文没有一个时， DRb 模块引发的错误。请参阅current_server。

trans-unit.source: Error raised by the DRbProtocol module when it cannot find any protocol implementation support the scheme specified in a URI.
trans-unit.target: DRbProtocol 模块在找不到任何协议实现支持 URI 中指定的方案时引发的错误。

trans-unit.source: Error raised when an error occurs on the underlying communication protocol.
trans-unit.target: 当底层通信协议发生错误时,引发错误。

trans-unit.source: Errors that are caused by the developer, like declaring a method which overwrites a thor keyword, SHOULD NOT raise a Bundler::Thor::Error. This way, we ensure that developer errors are shown with full backtrace.
trans-unit.target: 由开发人员引起的错误，例如声明覆盖thor关键字的方法，不应引发 Bundler::Thor::Error 。这样，我们确保开发人员错误以完整的回溯显示。

trans-unit.source: Errors that are caused by the developer, like declaring a method which overwrites a thor keyword, SHOULD NOT raise a Bundler::Thor::Error. This way, we ensure that developer errors are shown with full backtrace.
Escape as XML AttValue. The converted result is quoted as “…”. This form can be used as an HTML 4.0 attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 转义为 XML AttValue。转换后的结果引用为“…”。该形式可以用作HTML 4.0属性值。

trans-unit.source: Fibers are primitives for implementing light weight cooperative concurrency in Ruby. Basically they are a means of creating code blocks that can be paused and resumed, much like threads. The main difference is that they are never preempted and that the scheduling must be done by the programmer and not the VM.
trans-unit.target: Fibers是Ruby中实现轻量级合作并发的基元。基本上,它们是一种创建代码块的方法,这些代码块可以被暂停和恢复,就像线程一样。主要的区别是它们永远不会被抢占,而且调度必须由程序员而不是虚拟机来完成。

trans-unit.source: Finally PKey also features OpenSSL::PKey::DH, an implementation of the Diffie-Hellman key exchange protocol based on discrete logarithms in finite fields, the same basis that DSA is built on. The Diffie-Hellman protocol can be used to exchange (symmetric) keys over insecure channels without needing any prior joint knowledge between the participating parties. As the security of DH demands relatively long “public keys” (i.e. the part that is overtly transmitted between participants) DH tends to be quite slow. If security or speed is your primary concern, OpenSSL::PKey::EC offers another implementation of the Diffie-Hellman protocol.
trans-unit.target: 最后， PKey 还具有 OpenSSL::PKey::DH ，这是Diffie-Hellman密钥交换协议的实现，该协议基于有限域中的离散对数，这与 DSA 所基于的基础相同。 Diffie-Hellman协议可用于在不安全的信道上交换（对称）密钥，而无需参与方之间任何事先的联合知识。由于 DH 的安全性要求相对较长的“公钥”（即在参与者之间公开传输的部分），因此 DH 往往很慢。如果您最关心安全性或速度，则 OpenSSL::PKey::EC 提供Diffie-Hellman协议的另一种实现。

trans-unit.source: Finally, if the CGI object is not created in a standard CGI call environment (that is, it can't locate REQUEST_METHOD in its environment), then it will run in “offline” mode. Otherwise, cookies and other parameters are parsed automatically from the standard CGI locations, which varies according to the REQUEST_METHOD.
trans-unit.target: 最后，如果未在标准 CGI 调用环境中创建 CGI 对象（也就是说，它无法在其环境中找到REQUEST_METHOD），则它将在“离线”模式下运行。在这种模式下，它从命令行或从标准输入中读取参数（失败）。否则，将从标准 CGI 位置自动解析cookie和其他参数，这些位置根据REQUEST_METHOD而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: For the given method names, marks the method as passing keywords through a normal argument splat. This should only be called on methods that accept an argument splat (*args) but not explicit keywords or a keyword splat. It marks the method such that if the method is called with keyword arguments, the final hash argument is marked with a special flag such that if it is the final element of a normal argument splat to another method call, and that method call does not include explicit keywords or a keyword splat, the final element is interpreted as keywords. In other words, keywords will be passed through the method to other methods.
